channel.title: CVE Feed for libgit2 -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for libgit2 -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-10888|2024-09-16T16:18:17.644Z -- libgit2 -- libgit2
item.description: A flaw was found in libgit2 before version 0.27.3. A missing check in git_delta_apply function in delta.c file, may lead to an out-of-bound read while reading a binary delta file. An attacker may use this flaw to cause a Denial of Service.
